info.title: Farmer Platform API
info.description: API for farmers in Maharashtra with market rates, schemes, and AI advisory.

get.description: List all available crops for advisory and market rates.

schema.title: Response List Crops Api V1 Farmer Crops Get
Response List Schemes Api V1 Farmer Schemes Get

post.description: Get AI-powered soil and crop advisory based on farmer input.
Send a message to the AI Chatbot and get a response with updated history.

get.description: List daily market rates, with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Market Rates Api V1 Farmer Market Rates Get

get.description: List all configured API keys (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api V1 Utils Keys Get

post.description: Create a new API key or update an existing one (Admin only).

put.description: Update an existing API key's value or status (Admin only).

soil_type.title: Soil Type
soil_type.description: e.g., Black soil, Red soil, Alluvial soil.

nutrient_levels.title: Nutrient Levels
nutrient_levels.description: e.g., NPK values, Organic Carbon content.

advisory.title: Advisory
advisory.description: Detailed, localized advisory from the AI.
